Title: The General's Consensus
Description:
We got lucky here. That General Anub'azal is so interested in sabotaging Zev'kall that it's an "enemy of our enemy is our friend" situation for today.

I feel like this is gonna be a theme: spiders tryin' to use us against each other. Ah, well.

You're gonna want to take those pheromones somewhere useful, huh? You do that. I'll take these folks safely out of harm's way.
ObjectivesText: Take Zev'kall's pheromones to someone that has a use for them.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Take Zev'kall's pheromones to the Weaver.
CompletionText: What do you have for me?
RewardText:
What a beautiful gift!

General Anub'azal could be an excellent ally. I'm pleased with your work, morsel.
